findings.title: Security reminder on architecture design
findings.description: There are better practices for coding or architecture.

findings.title: Open-ended calls in createStdERC20 and createMintableERC20 functions
findings.description: The createStdERC20 and createMintableERC20 functions are open-ended calls. The user creates a contract using the createStdERC20 function to record the created information in _USER_STD_REGISTRY_, and then can get the information through getTokenByUser.
